holidays.title: National Bourbon Day
holidays.description: What happens when you combine corn, limestone, white oak, fire, and time? You get bourbon.

holidays.title: National Rosé Day
holidays.description: Celebrate summer, friends and all things pink on National Rosé Day!

holidays.title: World Blood Donor Day
holidays.description: From plasma treatments to emergency uses, donating blood has aided the world on several occasions.

holidays.title: Army Birthday
holidays.description: Join the celebration of the U.S. Army Birthday as we remember its creation in 1775.

holidays.title: Doll Day
holidays.description: Bring out your dolls and reminisce about the good ol’ days.

holidays.title: Eid-e-Ghadir
holidays.description: Eid-e-Ghadir is a day of celebration and remembrance for Shia Muslims all over the world.

holidays.title: Falkland Islands Liberation Day
holidays.description: Come celebrate a historical moment in the history of the Falkland Islands with us!

holidays.title: International Bath Day
holidays.description: Bring out your bubble bath and enjoy a luxurious soak on International Bath Day.

holidays.title: International Knit in Public Day
holidays.description: Join us as we stitch together a fun way to celebrate International Knit in Public Day!

holidays.title: Monkey Around Day
holidays.description: Today is the day to ‘go ape’, so let go and have a good time.

holidays.title: National Dog Dad Day
holidays.description: This day is for you and your beloved dog. Grab your pupper and enjoy it!

holidays.title: National New Mexico Day
holidays.description: This day is observed to pay tribute to the state of New Mexico and its people.

holidays.title: National Pop Goes The Weasel Day
holidays.description: This day celebrates the nursery rhyme that we all have been singing since we were kids.

holidays.title: National Strawberry Shortcake Day
holidays.description: Let’s dive deep into all the fun things you can do on National Strawberry Shortcake Day.

holidays.title: Pahili Day
holidays.description: There’s no better time than Pahili Raja Day to celebrate womanhood and Mother Earth!

holidays.title: Trooping The Colour
holidays.description: We go BuckingHAM on the palace with the Trooping the Colour ceremony.

holidays.title: World Gin Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the world’s favorite juniper-flavored spirit this World Gin Day.

holidays.title: World Juggling Day
holidays.description: Discover the wonders of juggling as an art that has enticed many since its inception.

holidays.title: Donald Trump’s Birthday
holidays.description: Everyone has an opinion about the 45th President of the United States, Donald Trump!

holidays.title: King Diamond’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Danish heavy metal singer has a vocal range that many others can only dream of.

holidays.title: Lucy Hale’s Birthday
holidays.description: If you want to know more about Lucy Hale, join us as we celebrate her birthday.

holidays.title: Tzuyu’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s no limit — not even the sky! —  for this amazing singer and dancer.
